title: Farmers Loan Benefit 12B
description: USDA provides direct farm ownership loans with low interest rates to new farmers or those who have suffered losses in the past two years.

title: Paycheck Protection Program (PPP)
description: A forgivable loan program to help small businesses keep their workforce employed during the COVID-19 crisis.

title: Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF)
description: Students working in public service for over 10 years may have their federal student loans forgiven after 120 qualifying payments.

title: Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA)
description: A federal program that provides job training and employment services for individuals looking to improve their skills, particularly for dislocated workers and low-income individuals.

title: Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher Program
organization: US Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD)
description: This program helps low-income families afford housing by providing rental subsidies that cover up to 70% of housing costs.

title: Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E)
description: This program helps veterans with service-connected disabilities prepare for, find, and maintain suitable jobs.

title: Federal Solar Tax Credit
description: A tax credit that allows homeowners and businesses to deduct 26% of the cost of installing solar energy systems from their federal taxes.

title: Pell Grant
description: Provides need-based grants to low-income undergraduate students to help cover the cost of higher education.

title: Economic Injury Disaster Loan (EIDL)
description: Provides economic relief to small businesses that are experiencing a temporary loss of revenue due to a declared disaster.

title: Teacher Education Assistance for College and Higher Education (TEACH) Grant
description: Provides grants of up to $4,000 per year to students who intend to teach in a public or private elementary or secondary school that serves low-income families.

title: First-Time Homebuyer Loan Program
description: FHA offers loans to first-time homebuyers with as little as 3.5% down payment, especially targeted at low-to-moderate-income buyers.

title: Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
description: SNAP provides food-purchasing assistance for low- and no-income individuals and families living in the U.S.

title: Green Jobs Training Program
description: Training and certification programs for jobs in renewable energy, energy efficiency, and environmental conservation.

title: Veterans Affairs Home Loan
description: VA home loans offer competitive interest rates and require no down payment for veterans and service members.

title: Career Skills Program
description: Provides active-duty service members with job training and education to help them transition to civilian careers.

title: Rural Development Loan
description: Provides low-interest loans for families and individuals living in rural areas to purchase, build, or improve their homes.

title: Health Professions Scholarship Program (HPSP)
description: Offers full tuition for medical, dental, and nursing students in exchange for military service post-graduation.
